semilla: Soy una persona que siempre busca la perfección pero nunca la alcanza. Me frustro fácilmente cuando las cosas no salen como espero.

mensajes.contenido: Soy una persona que siempre busca la perfección pero nunca la alcanza. Me frustro fácilmente cuando las cosas no salen como espero.

It’s exhausting, isn't it?  This constant… striving.  Like chasing a shadow.  I get so close, I can almost feel the perfection, the smooth surface of it, and then…poof. Gone.  Another mess, another failure.  Maybe I’m just setting the bar too high?  Or maybe… maybe the bar isn't the problem. Maybe *I'm* the problem.  Is it even worth it, this relentless pursuit?  The frustration eats at me, a gnawing hunger that never gets satisfied.  Maybe contentment isn't so bad after all.  But then… what am I even *for*?  If not this… this chase.
